identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a top 1% design that breaks category conventions using fusion, emotion, and negative space.

theme_strategy.concept: The Neural Bridge - A sci-fi command center for code orchestration.

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, major feature names. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: All UI text, buttons, inputs, code blocks, terminal output.

rules: Overlines must be UPPERCASE + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body

usage_rules: Background is Deep Void Black, not standard gray.
Primary (Electric Violet) is for 'AI Magic' actions only.
Secondary (Cyan) is for Data, Code, and Information density.
Accent (Neon Green) is for Success/Execution states.
Destructive (Hot Pink) is for Errors/Deletes - Cyberpunk style.
NEVER use gradients for text readability.

textures.noise: Add a subtle noise overlay to the main background to kill digital flatness.
textures.grid: Use a faint background grid (opacity 5%) for the 'blueprint' feel.

dashboard.grid: MODE B: THE CONTROL ROOM GRID
dashboard.alignment: Dense, filled. Use h-full to stretch.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slight rounded-sm. Tech-industrial look.

cards.style: Flat dark background, 1px border, no default shadow.

inputs.style: Dark gray background, no border until focus.

hero_background.description: Abstract Neural Network Blue/Red - Use as hero background with overlay

login_background.description: Cyberpunk Workspace - Use for Auth pages split layout

feature_ai.description: Abstract Blue Flower/Node - Represents AI Core

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text readability.
DO NOT center align the app container.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end, futuristic AI coding platform. Adhere strictly to the 'Neural Bridge' concept. Use the provided colors and fonts to create a distinct, non-generic look. Prioritize the 'Control Room' density for the dashboard and 'Tetris' asymmetry for the landing page. Use the image URLs provided for specific sections.
